support_ssl.description: Flag indicating server supports SSL.Should have a valid public key and certificate in 'sslcert' folder

gateway_has_certificate.description: Flag indicating the API gateway is configured to run on HTTPS

gateway_certificate_is_valid.description: Flag indicating the configured SSL certificate in the API gateway is a valid. This setting is active only if 'gateway_has_certificate' is true. This must be set to 'false' if API gateway is configured with a self signed certificate
